<title level="1" pfs="">[Reborn Sun Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1697)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

</column>

</column>

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Reborn Sun Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1697)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 11</row>

**Perception** +24; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[major staff of fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=356), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=159)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 195
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 10

**Burning Sacrifice** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) When the sun mage is destroyed, they explode in a blast of flame that deals 6d6 fire damage in a 10-foot emanation (DC 27 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Creatures that critically fail their saves are marked with [Walkena's](/Deities.aspx?ID=159) religious symbol on a visible area of their body, which remains for 1 day. This mark allows Walkena to treat the creature as if he knew the creature's identity but not having met them for the purposes of [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=268), lowering the spell's DC by 2. The sun mage's gear and treasure are unaffected by the explosion and left in a pile where they die.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning plus 2d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sunfire +19 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d6+12 fire

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84) (law or evil), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **5th**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

**Primal Spontaneous Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Barkskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276), [Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Elemental Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=98), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Fire Seeds](/Spells.aspx?ID=117), [Purple Worm Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=242) (3 slots)

**Revitalizing Flame** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The sun mage produces a specialized flame that burns away maladies and restores a creature. If the sun mage's next action is to Cast a Spell with the [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) trait that deals damage and isn't a cantrip, the spell doesn't deal any damage. It instead restores a number of Hit Points equal to four times the spell's level to all targets or creatures. This restoration affects all creatures regardless of whether they are healed by positive or negative energy

</column>
name: Reborn Sun Mage
